mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house_Contract (acc_year, ssg_code, ssg_name, dong_code, dong_name, land_kind, land_kind_name, bobn, bubn, floor, contract_date, rent_kind, rent_area, rent_deposit, rent_fee, building_name, build_year, house_kind_name, contract_period, new_ron_secd) VALUES (#{accYear}, #{ssgCode}, #{ssgName}, #{dongCode}, #{dongName}, #{landKind}, #{landKindName}, #{bobn}, #{bubn}, #{floor}, #{contractDate}, #{rentKind}, #{rentArea}, #{rentDeposit}, #{rentFee}, #{buildingName}, #{buildYear}, #{houseKindName}, #{contractPeriod}, #{newRonSecd})
